sentences.english: You will be resurrected onthe first mansion world.
sentences.chinese: 你将会在第一个灵界复活。

sentences.english: However, no eye in the sky opened suffering, the spirit world unknown.
sentences.chinese: 然而，苦于没有天目，不能了解灵界。

sentences.english: Attunement improves the connective ratios between the "Borderland" and the afterlife for a person.
sentences.chinese: 调谐为一个人提高“边界”和灵界之间的连接比率。

sentences.english: During go to school, her elder sister knew the Song Shangzhu that can communicate with clever bound.
sentences.chinese: 在上学期间，她姐识了能与灵界沟通的宋尚珠。

sentences.english: The Ouija Board is used to contact spirits or entities.
sentences.chinese: 显灵板是用来联系灵界的鬼魂。

definition: lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)

the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
